description: At this point, you should have sustainable mana generation. If you don't, you may wish to rectify that before moving on.
The resources from this world can only go so far in their abilities of mana manipulation. To truly advance, another world's resources are required.

With the terrasteel ingot you have just conjured, you may make an **Elven Gateway Core** and a pair of **Natura Pylons**. These, in addition to **two mana pools** and a handful of **livingwood logs** and **glowstone**, will allow for the construction of the **Alfheim Portal**, and thereby let you exchange knowledge and goods with elven botanists.
Upon opening the portal, the first thing you should do is **toss in your Lexica Botania**. After that, the elven resources are now yours to use.
